list.name: Changes
list.comment:
View Expense Screen Completed!
- You can now add expenses & view expenses! - All warnings cleared
Next Up: We are onto the last two features before completing version 1! So finally we are going to complete the Account page and the "Amount spent this week" on the front home screen which refreshes every time you open the screen.

task.summary: Developed the login screen, some ammendments to be done but its functional. connected to a local database running on mysql

Login screen amended, heres the changes: -handled basic sql injection attacks - re-structured a bit to handle the connection better. - Also added execption for if the database is not reachable. - Removed debugging lines for the login screen.
Next up is the landing page

Login screen amended, heres the changes: -handled basic sql injection attacks - re-structured a bit to handle the connection better. - Also added execption for if the database is not reachable. - Removed debugging lines for the login screen. - Cleared all warnings and errors
Next up is the landing page... \^-^/

Created the landing page! - All errors and bugs have been patched. - database management has imporved, at the point of logging we grab some variables for the home screen. - Reorganised the project again to minimise code duplication - Transactions table created - Only warnings are the empty ifs on the home screen buttons but as we add screens that will go away. - Also added a logout button.
Next up is the Add a friend page. This whoop whoop :)
Utilisation to the MAX - Added the home screen to the ScreenUtils class. - Restarting to clear some ghost error
Utilisation to the MAX - Added the home screen to the ScreenUtils class. - Restarting to clear some ghost error - Successful
Utilisation to the MAX - Added the home screen to the ScreenUtils class. - Restarting to clear some ghost error - Successful

Add a new user screen!
- Added new user screen - optimised opening the new screen
TODO:
- Create a standard connection a new utility class for querying/inserting from/into the database.
Next up will be adding the functionality to the new user screen to be able save into the database.

New User Screen 95% Complete!
The new user screen is now complete, I've made alot of modifications to the layout of the code in this file but finally happy with where it is. It now logs when users create others as well as logging if it was successful or if it failed, that will help with any troubleshooting required.
TODO:
- Ensure that only users with admin permission can create admins.

New User Screen Complete!
- Implemented rt_isAdmin

New User Screen Complete!
- Implemented rt_isAdmin (Fixed)

New User Screen Complete!
- Implemented rt_isAdmin (Fixed) - Reset button complete as was missed - Simplified some if statements
Next up! - Add new expense screen

New Expense Screen Completed!
- You can now add expenses! - Errors are all sorted with this newest version. - Database ERD complete, logging implemented with this version of the screen.
Reminder: - This is a proof of concept project. Final designs will look very different.
Next Up: The next feature will be the view of the database in app, once I've got that then its just the account screen where you can change the username, first name, last name and password.

View Expense Screen Completed!
- You can now add expenses & view expenses! - All warnings cleared
Next Up: We are onto the last two features before completing version 1! So finally we are going to complete the Account page and the "Amount spent this week" on the front home screen which refreshes every time you open the screen.

Next up is the Add a friend page. This whoop whoop :)

Add a new user screen!

Next up will be adding the functionality to the new user screen to be able save into the database.

New User Screen 95% Complete!
The new user screen is now complete, I've made alot of modifications to the layout of the code in this file but finally happy with where it is. It now logs when users create others as well as logging if it was successful or if it failed, that will help with any troubleshooting required.

New User Screen Complete!

Next up! - Add new expense screen
